title: Worked
comment: Now was able to connect, thanks. Though a message about invalid certificate would be helpful. Now I see no support for saved queries and nested projects: I see no issues from subprojects.

Thank you for reporting userability. We met a bug that connection is not saved when we have tried to support android 5.0. But in this result, please try to check "permit untrusted certificate" if your redmine is in SSL. There is no error even if there is problem.

title: Best One
comment: it has not the holo design, no nice color/icon vor priority, i could not use the Filter and there is no widget - But from all the Redmine Client - it works at best, stable and fast :) - so keep working, it is more then nice :D
Thank you for testing. Unfortunately, this app that is under developing supports Holo-design at the theme setting. If could, please give us more debuggable information about filter.

title: Cool app
comment: Token auth is cool. App works with 2.5.2 after update. Thanx.

Thank you for testing. We tried to retrieve data from v2.5.2. The result was success to fetch data.(github:#140) Please re-try with "open connection list - show menu - remove all cache".(note: This action may be lost favorites on stored the app)
Awful

Thank you for reporting. (#128)
We gonna make sure what is wrong on Developer console provided by google.
Works

Thank you for testing.
We work hard to develop this by irrational reason that comes from job stress.
If you notice something, feedback to us.

title: Looks promising, but won't pull data
comment: Would love to give a higher rating, but it currently isn't pulling data. It updates the project's access key perfectly but won't pull the projects or issues.   Redmine 2.3.3

Thank you for testing. This is known issue that it detects connection error (authentication or wrong request etc.). If there is time, we setup redmine 2.3.3 to test this (because our environment is crashed HDDs last month even if raidz2...). github:#74

title: Great Redmine Client
comment: As a developer [in general not to this app specifically], I smile every time I find a GPL licensed app.  There would be no reason for me to rate this less than 5 stars.. unless I just wanted to say "I'm lazy."  It's a really nice app though for real.. check it out.

Thank you for checking out this. 
This app is designed to the purpose that "Once use Redmine, the user can not go back again(this purpose is not only for this app)".
We also needs reviewer of the code through lack of our experience.

title: Shows _every_ project.
comment: This seems like a nice app but I can't tell for sure because I'm on hostedredmine, where there are hundreds of projects and I can't even find mine. This is one of several promising Redmine apps that I cannot use or recommend to my team because there is no way to limit which projects are displayed.

That is fact that the user is difficult to know where project is exists. We gonna make a release about favorite project. Currently, if could find home button at app icon on issue detail , then the project would be back to you.
On 2014/02/14 18:00(GMT) released favorite feature.

title: Just plain works and intuitive. Thx!
comment: This app works with our system where others just did not work.  We use https with a self-signed certificate, and this app will allow it.  Also, it is the most complete tool with the ability to completely edit and add comments and move the tickets through all their phases.  I just wish for two features: 1. The ability to sort tickets 2. The ability to save default projects and have the tool open straight to that project. -We have over 100 projects and it takes a bit of time to jump to my projects.

Thank you for making the test and reporting. Recently other apps are also supports many projects. After v3.4(maybe v3.5), we try to add feature: my project, because I waste time to pick a project on hostedredmine. 
The sort is exists on filer setting(issue list).
On 2014/02/14 18:00(GMT) released favorite feature.

title: The best Redmine client by far.
comment: This one is among the best Redmine clients by far allowing you to edit Issues. I am looking forward to better UI and bug fixes - I can only select one Activity type in Issue update. Sort by priority would be handy too. Keep rockin'! :-)

Add some of the feature that sort by priority (internal IDs).
v2.1 later is supported enumerations via rest api on redmine 2.2.
If you have something about new UI, we may try to be the best redmine on yours.

title: Not complete
comment: It didn't show me all of my projects

v2.0 is supported show all of projects.
Tested with hostedredmine.

title: Early days
comment: Alpha versions are always buggy. I was too early in installing this. Will wait a bit.
Almost versions are always buggy. Help us by using this and reporting bug.
